entry.title: Snoop Dogg, Gary Vee Latest to Buy Ethereum Ownership NFTs in Ice Cube’s BIG3 Hoops League
entry.summary: Snoop teamed up with PayPal co-founder Ken Howery to buy team Bivouac's NFTs.

entry.title: This Week on Crypto Twitter: Coinbase NFT Flops, Musk Mocks NFTs, Scaramucci Pumps Algorand
entry.summary: Elsewhere: A Bitcoin improvement proposal sparked concern, and regulators in Dubai opened an office in the metaverse.

entry.title: GM, WAGMI, GN: Decrypt’s Ultimate Guide to Bitcoin and NFT Slang
entry.summary: Acronyms and misspellings run amok in the cryptoverse. Here’s a list of the most-used terms and their definitions.

entry.title: Terra’s LUNA Declines 10% Amid UST Depegging Concern
entry.summary: Although a 1% depeg from $1 isn’t unusual for stablecoins when markets are under pressure, in the case of UST, it’s been more than 16 hours.

entry.title: Bitcoin Falls Below $35K for First Time Since January
entry.summary: Bitcoin began sliding amid hawkish comments from the U.S. Federal Reserve on Wednesday, which also brought down traditional markets.

entry.title: You and Whose Army? The Many Maxi Militias of the Crypto World
entry.summary: Bagholder communities around crypto assets can grow so big that they resemble small armies. Here are a few of the most prominent supporter groups.

entry.title: How ERC-4626 Could Fuel the Next Wave of DeFi
entry.summary: Applications built on top of ERC-4626 vaults work with all yield-bearing ERC-4626 vaults, making integration and innovation much easier.

entry.title: Why Avalanche Is the Killer App for NFT Games: Ava Labs President
entry.summary: Avalanche’s subnets give game creators more flexibility and can insulate them from wider network issues, John Wu tells Decrypt.

entry.title: This Week in Coins: Markets Slide Fifth Straight Week, Argentina's Largest Private Bank Offers Bitcoin
entry.summary: Elsewhere: Great news for crypto miners in Uzbekistan who can afford their own solar power.

entry.title: How $50 Million in Loans Nearly Crashed Fantom
entry.summary: What happens to a crypto network when a $50 million loan gets liquidated on-chain? Last week, Fantom gave us the alarming answer.

entry.title: The Bitcoin Bloodbath Will Get Worse. This Is Fine.
entry.summary: The current crypto market carnage will probably get worse—but don't take your eyes off the big picture.

entry.title: Ethereum NFT Collective Doodles Names Billboard Executive as New CEO
entry.summary: Billboard executive Julian Holguin is joining the NFT collective.

entry.title: What Is Collab.Land? A Digital 'Concierge' for Tokenized Communities
entry.summary: The chatbot powers a wide array of crypto ecosystems on Telegram and Discord.

entry.title: Robinhood Adds Grayscale Bitcoin and Ethereum Trusts
entry.summary: Robinhood has been leaning into crypto recently. The addition of GBTC and ETHE continues the trend.

entry.title: Google Forms Web3 Team to Tap the Market's 'Tremendous Potential'
entry.summary: Customers have been asking for more support for "Web3 and Crypto related technologies," Google Cloud VP Amit Zavery wrote in an email.

entry.title: US Treasury Issues First Sanctions Against a Cryptocurrency Mixer
entry.summary: OFAC claims that crypto mixing service Blender has links to North Korean hackers and was used to launder funds stolen from Axie Infinity.

entry.title: SEC Fines Nvidia $5.5M for Not Disclosing Crypto Mining Impact on Gaming Business
entry.summary: Chip manufacuturer Nvidia has paid a $5.5 million penalty for failing to disclose the impact of crypto mining on the firm's gaming business.

entry.title: Sony and Theta Labs Launch 3D NFTs That You Can (Almost) Touch
entry.summary: The limited-edition NFT collection will be viewable on the Sony Spatial Reality Display, which creates the sensation of solid 3D objects without any accessories.

entry.title: OpenSea Suffers Discord Exploit Promoting YouTube NFT Scam
entry.summary: The leading NFT marketplace OpenSea today confirmed it is investigating a potential vulnerability in its Discord server.

entry.title: ApeCoin, Axie Infinity Plummet Double-Digits as Bitcoin Corrects
entry.summary: Popular NFT-adjacent cryptocurrencies like Axie Infinity's AXS and ApeCoin have plummeted amid a wider market rout.

entry.title: Senator Warren Raises Concerns About Fidelity's Bitcoin Retirement Plans
entry.summary: “We are concerned that Fidelity would take these risks with millions of Americans’ retirement savings,” wrote Senators Tina Smith and Elizabeth Warren.

entry.title: What Is Aave? Inside the DeFi Lending Protocol
entry.summary: DeFi protocol Aave is one of the largest lenders of cryptocurrency and its AAVE token has a larger market cap than rivals Maker or Compound. Here's how it works.

entry.title: Bitcoin, Ethereum Continue to Fall as Losses Deepen Across the Crypto Market
entry.summary: Wednesday was fairly bullish. Thursday is extra bearish.

entry.title: Deadpool Creator Rob Liefeld on His Controversial Career in Comics: 'I’m Like a Walking NFT'
entry.summary: Liefeld just dropped Bloodstrike NFTs on Ethereum, and discussed the potential impact of NFTs on the comic book industry with Decrypt.

entry.title: Twitter's Bluesky Releases First Code for Decentralized Social Media Network
entry.summary: Bluesky developers are still in the R&D phase.

entry.title: Coinbase's NFT Marketplace Gains Fewer Than 150 Users in First Day Open to Public
entry.summary: The once-anticipated platform still has fewer than 1,300 total users, according to Dune data.

entry.title: Luna Foundation Guard Buys Another $1.5B in Bitcoin to Back Terra Stablecoin
entry.summary: “For the first time, you’re starting to see a pegged currency that is attempting to observe the bitcoin standard,” said Terra co-founder Do Kwon.

entry.title: Moonbirds, Solana Boost NFT Market in April as Sales Jump 45%
entry.summary: So much for a slump: NFT trading volume soared last month, and May is already off to a hot start thanks to Bored Ape metaverse land.

entry.title: 5 Biggest 'Ethereum Killers'
entry.summary: Everyone wants to take down Ethereum, the biggest blockchain network for smart contracts.

entry.title: Bitcoin Drops 5% as Fed-Fueled Market Rally Fades
entry.summary: Following hawkish comments from the Fed, crypto and stocks alike have faced a serious bout of volatility over the past day.

entry.title: NFT Platform Zora Raises $50M in First Big Bet for Haun Ventures
entry.summary: Haun Ventures, which has raised $1.5 billion for crypto investments, led a $50 million funding round in NFT platform Zora.

entry.title: YellowHeart is Transforming How Tickets Are Issued, Sold and Exchanged
entry.summary: From soccer matches to music festivals, NFT tickets are set to offer unique features and a fair deal for both buyers and sellers.

entry.title: The Biggest Crypto Deal That Wasn't: A Closer Look at Galaxy's BitGo Purchase
entry.summary: One year after Galaxy announced its purchase of BitGo, the deal still hasn't closed—and the "biggest ever" sticker price may not be what it seems.

entry.title: Yuga Labs Refunds Gas Fees For Failed Transactions During Bored Ape Otherdeed Mint
entry.summary: Last weekend’s Otherdeed mint briefly sent gas prices on Ethereum skyrocketing, with some paying thousands of dollars to push transactions through.

entry.title: Former BitMEX Chief Arthur Hayes Asks New York Judge for No Jail Time
entry.summary: BitMEX co-founder and former CEO Arthur Hayes asks court for a non-jail sentence and permission to travel and live abroad.

entry.title: Binance Backs Elon Musk's Twitter Acquisition Bid With $500M
entry.summary: Binance is backing Elon Musk's Twitter takeover bid, along with Sequoia, a16z, Fidelity, Qatar, and Larry Ellison.

entry.title: DeFi Tokens Jump Double Digits as Bitcoin, Ethereum Mount Recovery
entry.summary: As the wider cryptocurrency market is back on the rise, several blue-chip DeFi tokens posted significant gains over the past day.

entry.title: Gucci to Begin Accepting Bitcoin in Some Stores
entry.summary: Gucci is the latest luxury brand to begin accepting crypto payments.

entry.title: Freedom Squares Ethereum NFTs Turn Zelensky’s Words Into Ukraine Relief
entry.summary: The project will raise funds for Sean Penn’s CORE and Chef José Andrés’ World Central Kitchen, which are on the ground in Ukraine.

entry.title: Texas Crowdfunding Platform Offers Investors Fractional Ownership in Bitcoin Mines
entry.summary: EnergyFunders will issue monthly payouts in Bitcoin or U.S. dollars, saying returns could top 100% if the Bitcoin price stays in the $45,000 range.

entry.title: Inside the Bored Ape Yacht Club NFT Restaurant in L.A.
entry.summary: Decrypt's Kate Irwin interviews Kevin Seo, co-founder of Bored & Hungry, the BAYC-inspired burger joint in Los Angeles. Video shot and edited by Decrypt's Jason Nelson.

entry.title: gm Podcast, Episode 8: All About Avalanche with John Wu
entry.summary: Ava Labs president John Wu talks to Dan Roberts and Jeff Roberts about the meteoric rise of so-called "Ethereum killer" Avalanche (he hates that phrase), its utility and usability, AVAX token, tribalism in crypto, the SEC and regulation, and NFT backlash.

entry.title: NFT Artist pplpleasr: 'You Should Be Thinking of DAOs Like Subreddits'
entry.summary: Emily Yang, aka pplpleasr, the inspiration for the NFT collective PleasrDAO, talked DAOs and crypto interest groups on Decrypt's gm podcast with Dan Roberts and Jeff Roberts. Yang says people shouldn't be joining DAOs with the aim of making money; she compares them to Subreddits or video game clans.

entry.title: Astronaut Scott Kelly Discusses NFT Project, Crypto Holdings, and the Metaverse
entry.summary: Retired NASA astronaut Scott Kelly talks to Decrypt’s Andrew Hayward about his new Ethereum NFT collection, which benefits relief efforts in Ukraine, plus the cryptocurrencies he holds and his excitement about the metaverse.

entry.title: Gemini COO Talks to Decrypt at Bitcoin Miami 2022
entry.summary: Gemini COO Noah Perlman talks to Decrypt's Kate Irwin at Bitcoin Miami 2022 about Gemini's approach to competing with other exchanges, its focus on regulatory compliance, and his own views on Bitcoin maximalists.

entry.title: Robinhood Crypto CTO Talks to Decrypt at Bitcoin Miami 2022
entry.summary: Robinhood Crypto CTO Johann Kerbrat talks to Decrypt's Kate Irwin at Bitcoin Miami 2022 about Robinhood's new Lightning Network integration, potential NFT plans, and Kerbrat's personal history with crypto, including mining Bitcoin back in 2010.
